description:
Layfon and Leerin`s foster father from the orphanage in Glendan. He taught Layfon the Saiharden techniques throughout Layfon`s childhood. He and Leerin left the orphanage after taking Layfon`s side during the gambling incident in Glendan. Derk gave Leerin a box which contains a DITE to recognize Layfon for learning all of the Saiharden techniques. He and Haia`s master were brother apprentices.
Source: en.wiki
name: Derk Saiharden
